content: संस्थितिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Being together, staying with. {@--2@} Contiguity, nearness, vicinity. {@--3@} Residence, abode, resting-place; यथा नदीनदाः सर्वे सागरे यांति संस्थितिम् . तथैवाश्रतिणः सर्वे गृहस्थे यांति संस्थितिं <ls>Ms. 6. 90.</ls> {@--4@} Accumulation, heap. {@--5@} Duration, continuance; <ls>H. 1. 43.</ls> {@--6@} Station, state, condition of life. {@--7@} Restraint. --Death. {@--8@} Destruction of the world.
